name: 結華
text: はあ……はあ……ごめーん！　遅くなっちゃった！
trans: Haaah... Haaah... So sorry I'm late!

name: 恋鐘
text:
そんなのよかよ～、気にすることなか！
それで、今日はどこに連れてってくれんね？
trans: S'all good, don't worry 'bout it! Anyhow, are ya gonna finally tell us where we're goin'?

name: 結華
text: それはまぁ、行ってみてからのお楽しみ、です！
trans: Ahah, not yet. Look forward to finding out once we arrive!

name: 恋鐘
text: え～、まだ教えてくれんと？
trans: Eh~? Ya still ain't tellin' us?

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ。でもその方が、着いた時の驚きも
一層高まるんじゃないかな
trans: Heh. I think keeping it a secret will make the surprise when we arrive all the richer.

name: 結華
text:
そうそう、そんな感じ！
三峰は日頃からみんなに驚きを提供したいわけです！
trans: Yeah, exactly! What Sakuyan said! Mitsumine is always trying to give everyone the gift of surprise!

name: 霧子
text: ……楽しみ。ふふ……
trans: I'm excited... Eheh.

name: 摩美々
text: 私はぁ……横になれる場所がいいかもー
trans: Hopefully... It'll be a place where I can lie down.

name: 結華
text:
……まみみんの希望は叶えられるかちょっと微妙だけど、
まぁ、行こっか！　ついてきて！
trans: ...Whether or not this place will allow for that I can't really say, Mamimin. But anyway, let's get going! Follow me!

name: 咲耶
text: ここは……アンティークショップか。素敵な店だね
trans: This is... An antique shop, I see? What a beautiful establishment.

name: 恋鐘
text: カフェにもなっとるんやねぇ。ハイカラたい
trans: It's got a cafe an' everythin' too! So chic.

name: 霧子
text: うん……
trans: Yes...

name: 結華
text:
ここさ、この間こがたんときりりんと本屋巡りした時に
見かけたんだよねぇ
trans: I actually discovered this place when I was shopping for books with Kiririn and Kogatan earlier.

name: 恋鐘
text:
そうだったん？　うち、全然気づかんかったばい
なんで教えてくれんかったと？
trans:
Ya did? I never noticed it.
So, why were ya keepin' it a secret from us?

name: 結華
text:
いやぁだって、手持ちのネタは１番いいタイミングで
使いたいじゃん
trans: Ahah, well. I had something funny I wanted to say regarding this place, and I wanted to save it until the comedic timing was perfect.

name: 結華
text: せっかくなんだし、みんなで来たいでしょ？
trans: In order for it to work I needed to bring you all here, see.

name: 摩美々
text:
アンティーカでアンティークショップに来るー、とか、
そういうオヤジギャグ言っちゃう感じですかぁ？
trans: Let me guess. You wanted to make some dad joke about "L'ANT-ica at an ANT-ique shop", right?

name: 結華
text: あっ、まみみんひどい！　三峰今いいこと言ったのに！
trans: Augh, Mamimin you jerk! It was gonna be such a good bit!

name: 摩美々
text: いいことって言うかぁ、サムいことって言うかぁ
trans: A good bit? Or maybe an incredibly lame bit?

name: 結華
text: やー！　まみみんがドライだよ～！　助けてさくや～ん！
trans: Oh no! Mamimin's being a stick in the mud! Help me out here, Sakuyan!

name: 咲耶
text: フフ。私はこういう雰囲気、素敵だと思うよ
trans: Heh. I personally think this shop has a lovely atmosphere.

name: 恋鐘
text: そうたい！　うちらのためのお店って感じがするとよ！
trans: Darn right! It feels like this place is here jus' for us!

name: 霧子
text: わたしも……うん……！
trans: Yes... I think so too!

name: 結華
text: おやぁ？　即４対１になっちゃったねまみみん
trans: What's this? Looks like you're getting beat 4 to 1, Mamimin.

name: 摩美々
text: ……私だって、別に嫌いとは言ってないケドー
trans: ...Hey, it's not like I said I hated it.

name: 結華
text: あらま、素直じゃない
trans: Awww, Mamimin's being genuine~!

name: 結華
text:
でも、みんなが気に入ってくれたならほんとに良かった
いろいろ見てこうね
trans: Anyway, I'm glad everyone seems to have taken a liking to it. Go and have a look around!

name: 恋鐘
text:
お～、おしゃれなものがいっぱいあるたい
家具に雑貨に……食器もあるとね
trans: Wah! Everythin' here is so stylish! Furniture, knick-knacks... Oh an' tableware too!

name: 咲耶
text: ……綺麗な器だ。細工も細かい……
trans: What a gorgeous bowl. The craftsmanship is exquisite...

name: 恋鐘
text: 咲耶はこういうのわかると？
trans: D'ya know a lot 'bout this stuff, Sakuya?

name: 咲耶
text:
いや、それほど詳しくはないのだけれど……
作り手の気持ちが伝わってくるものは素敵だと思わないかい
trans: Ah no, I'm not especially knowledgeable... But I think it's beautiful how much love you can feel in something that was made by hand.

name: 咲耶
text:
……ほら、このあたりとか
すごく根気がいりそうだし、努力が見える気がしてね
trans: ...Look at this detailing. It must have taken a lot of patience to sculpt. You can feel how much effort was put into it making it.

name: 恋鐘
text:
むぅ……確かに言われてみれば
そんな気がすると
trans: Hm... Lookin' at it again I do sorta see whatcha mean.

name: 恋鐘
text:
でもうち的には、天井のシャンデリアが
きらきらしてて好みばい
trans: My favorite thing here is that chandelier hangin' from the ceilin', though! I love how it's sparklin'!

name: 霧子
text: わたしは、これ……。銀のじょうろ……！
trans: My favorite is, this... A silver watering can!

name: 結華
text:
みんなそれぞれお気に入り見つけた感じ？
って、まみみんがいないのか
trans: Seems like everyone's found an item that really speaks to them! Uh wait, where'd Mamimin go?

name: 恋鐘
text: ああ、摩美々なら向こうで……
trans: Uh, Mamimi's over there...

name: 摩美々
text: ……すぅー
trans: ...Zzz

name: 霧子
text:
ま、摩美々ちゃん……！
そ、そこは……だめ……！
trans:
M-Mamimi!
Y-You shouldn't... sleep there!

name: 摩美々
text: ……大丈夫ー、いざとなったら買うしー……すぅ
trans: ...It's fine, if it gets messed up I'll just buy it. Zzz...

name: 霧子
text: 摩美々ちゃん……！
trans: Mamimi...

name: 咲耶
text:
摩美々、さすがに寝てしまうのはよくないよ
それに……ああ、やっぱりいいお値段だ
trans: Mamimi, I don't think its a good idea to nap there. Also... My goodness, the price tag on that couch is no laughing matter.

name: 恋鐘
text:
いち、じゅう、ひゃく、せん、まん、……！
これ、ダメな金額ばいっとらん……！？
trans: There's one, two, three, four, FIVE zeros!? That much money'll break yer bank!?

name: 結華
text:
おおう、まみみん起きないとやばいよー
よだれ付けたら弁償だよ？
trans: Uh-oh, we've gotta wake her up before it's too late! If you get drool on it they're gonna make you pay full price, Mamimin?

name: 摩美々
text:
もおー……うるさいなぁ……
大丈夫だってばぁ……
trans:
Ughhh.... Shut uppp...
It'll be fine...

name: 結華
text: ……結構ギャグでもないぞー？
trans: ...I'm not kidding at all here?

name: 咲耶
text: ……フフ。たまにはああいうものを見るのもいいものだね
trans: ...Heh. Looking through old items is such a valuable experience.

name: 霧子
text: みんなで行くの……楽しい……
trans: It's so nice... When we go places together.

name: 咲耶
text: ユニット全体でイメージを共有できたんじゃないかな
trans: That shop felt like it summed up our image both as individuals, and as a unit.

name: 摩美々
text:
あのソファー……寝心地良かったなぁ
ほんとに買おうかなぁ……
trans:
And that couch sure was comfortable...
I might buy it for real.

name: 恋鐘
text: あはは、摩美々、気に入りすぎばい！
trans: Ahahah! Ya might love that couch a lil' too much, Mamimi!

name: 霧子
text: ……結華ちゃんは……どうかな……？
trans: What about you... Yuika?

name: 咲耶
text: 楽しめたかい？
trans: Did you enjoy yourself?

name: 結華
text:
んー？　三峰はおもてなしする側だからね
優先度は低でしょ
trans: Who, me? No no, Mitsumine was the one treating you all, her enjoyment is of the least concern.

name: 摩美々
text: そんなこと言って、１番楽しそうだったケド
trans: You say that but, you looked like you were having the most fun out of all of us.

name: 結華
text: ありゃー、バレたぁ？　三峰どこにいても楽しいからなー
trans: Uh-oh, have I been found out? Mitsumine has fun wherever she goes, that's all!

name: 結華
text: ……ま、でも確かに、今日の楽しさは特別だったけどね
trans: ...Although, I can't deny that the fun I had with with everyone today was extra special.
